longBusinessSummary: RHI Magnesita India Limited engages in the manufacture and trading of in refractories, monolithics, bricks, and ceramic paper in India and internationally. It offers isostatically pressed continuous casting refractories, slide gate plates, nozzles and well blocks, tundish nozzles, bottom purging refractories and top purging lances, slag arresting darts, castables, and alumina and magnesia carbon bricks, as well as spray mass for tundish working linings. The company also provides management services. It serves steel, cement, nonferrous metals, glass, environment and energy, foundry, and paper and pulp industries. The company was formerly known as Orient Refractories Limited and changed its name to RHI Magnesita India Limited in July 2021. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is based in Gurugram, India. RHI Magnesita India Limited is a subsidiary of Veitscher Vertriebsgesellschaft m.b.H.
